function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI for real-time combat of COVID-19","Impact":"Over-reliance on AI without human oversight, leading to inaccurate predictions and decisions","Mitigation":"Regular human oversight of AI predictions and decisions, validation of AI models with human expertise","Technologies":"AI validation tools, human-in-the-loop AI systems","People":"Healthcare workers, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Data mining and analysis for COVID-19 monitoring","Impact":"Privacy violations, unauthorized data access, and misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy policies, anonymize data, obtain consent for data collection","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, secure data storage, user consent management systems","People":"Data subjects, citizens, patients","Owner":"Data regulators, smart city authorities"},{"Description":"Real-time surveillance for COVID-19 detection","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, stigmatization, and discrimination based on health data","Mitigation":"Ethical use of surveillance data, secure storage and access control, public education on data use","Technologies":"Ethical AI algorithms, secure data storage, access control mechanisms","People":"General public, individuals under surveillance","Owner":"Smart city authorities, data privacy regulators"}]}
